mapper.sql: SELECT l.lodging_id "l.lodging_id", l.lodging_picture_1 "l.lodging_picture1", l.lodging_name "l.lodging_name", l.lodging_type "l.lodging_type", r.min_room_price "r.room_price" FROM lodging l JOIN (SELECT lodging_id, MIN(room_price) min_room_price FROM room GROUP BY lodging_id) r ON l.lodging_id = r.lodging_id
